title: Slayer ring (eternal)

properties.value: The Slayer ring (eternal) is a special slayer ring that is made with an eternal gem instead of an enchanted gem. It provides unlimited teleport charges, compared to the eight of its normal counterpart. It is only obtainable through Crafting, and is otherwise crafted the same way as the normal slayer ring and has the same requirements (namely 75 Crafting and having purchased the Ring bling unlock from any Slayer master for 300 Slayer reward points).

Item ID21268

The Slayer ring (eternal) is a special slayer ring that is made with an eternal gem instead of an enchanted gem. It provides unlimited teleport charges, compared to the eight of its normal counterpart. It is only obtainable through Crafting, and is otherwise crafted the same way as the normal slayer ring and has the same requirements (namely 75 Crafting and having purchased the Ring bling unlock from any Slayer master for 300 Slayer reward points).

Be warned that once crafted, the gem cannot be taken out of the ring. Also, if a player dies in PvP combat with a ring equipped or in their inventory, the ring will completely disappear.

Players can obtain an eternal gem by killing superior slayer monsters, which are monsters that rarely spawn after slaying a Slayer monster if the player has purchased Bigger and Badder for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master.

Teleports[edit | edit source]

The ring will teleport players to the same locations as the normal slayer ring, which are listed below. Like dragonstone jewellery and the normal slayer ring, the slayer ring (eternal) will allow players to teleport from up to level 30 Wilderness.

Location Destination Requirements Notes
Slayer Tower Ground floor, just inside the entrance. Priest in Peril Can be used for easy access to Canifis.
Fremennik Slayer Dungeon Just inside the entrance. None Third closest teleport to a fairy ring (the Quest point cape teleport being the closest).
Tarn's Lair Empty room before the Terror dogs' chamber. Haunted Mine
Stronghold Slayer Cave Outside the cave, close to Nieve. None Close to a Bank. Those who use NPC Contact may also find this teleport useful as they can teleport to Nieve and cancel/block their tasks with her while using NPC Contact to contact other Slayer masters (such as Duradel) to try to get the task they want.
Dark Beasts Dark Beasts' chamber in the Mourner Tunnels. Mourning's End Part II Can be used to access the Mourner Tunnels without Mourner clothing.

(update)

The item's value was increased from 15,300 to 35,300.

27 September 2018
(update)

A "Check" option while the item is stored in the bank was added.

[[File:Slayer ring (eternal) detail.png|left|140px]]
The '''Slayer ring (eternal)''' is a special [[slayer ring]] that is made with an [[eternal gem]] instead of an [[enchanted gem]]. It provides unlimited teleport charges, compared to the eight of its normal counterpart. It is only obtainable through [[Crafting]], and is otherwise crafted the same way as the normal slayer ring and has the same requirements (namely 75 Crafting and having purchased the ''Ring bling'' unlock from any [[Slayer master]] for 300 [[Slayer reward points]]).

'''Be warned that once crafted, the gem cannot be taken out of the ring. Also, if a player dies in [[Player killing|PvP combat]] with a ring equipped or in their inventory, the ring will completely disappear.'''

Players can obtain an eternal gem by killing [[superior slayer monster]]s, which are monsters that rarely spawn after slaying a Slayer monster if the player has purchased ''Bigger and Badder'' for 150 [[Slayer reward point]]s from any [[Slayer master]].
